overview: Vamsi (Sivaji) buys a pre-owned and fully furnished beach house in Vizag. He saves a dancing girl Maya (Shraddha Das) from a goon in a local gathering. She stays along with Vamsi in his house that night as its raining heavily. As they explore the house, they find a diary written in 2002. They find out that it was written a previous owner, whose wife gets killed and she is rumored to be staying there as a ghost. The events in the diary start happening to this pair. The rest of the story is about unlocking the mystery behind the house.
title: Diary
